definition[0]: a popular and fashionable style, activity, method etc
example[0]: Suntanning first came into vogue in the mid-1930s.
example[1]: Short skirts are very much in vogue just now.
example[2]: the vogue for large families in the pre-war years
definition[1]: a fashion magazine for women, which includes photographs of expensive clothes and articles about new fashions, health, and beauty
